item.description: Get started with GRUB2 https://www.certdepot.net/rhel7-get-started-grub2/ Note: This is an RHCSA 7 exam objective. Presentation of GRUB2 GRUB2 is the new Linux bootloader. GRUB2 stands for GRand Unified Bootloader version 2. As GRUB was not maintained for some time and lacked some critical features like GPT management needed to handle disks bigger than 2.4TB, it was decided to start a new version from scratch with modularity in mind.
